sentences.en: According to protocol, he first reported to the Director of the hospital.
sentences.cn: 根据礼节，他先向医院院长报到。

sentences.en: He is presently the medical director for the Fellowship of World Christians.
sentences.cn: 他目前是世界基督徒团契的主任医师。

sentences.en: He knew he was never going to make director.
sentences.cn: 他明白自己永远也当不了导演。

sentences.en: He recently vacated his post as NHS Personnel Director.
sentences.cn: 他最近辞去了国民保健署人事主管一职。

sentences.en: He was hauled before the managing director and fired.
sentences.cn: 他被叫去见总裁，然后就被解雇了。

sentences.en: He will remain affiliated with the firm as a special associate director.
sentences.cn: 他将作为特别副经理继续为该公司工作。

sentences.en: I escalated to the dizzy heights of director's secretary.
sentences.cn: 我升到了总经理秘书这一显赫高位。

sentences.en: I was promoted to editor and then editorial director.
sentences.cn: 我先是被提升为编辑，然后又晋升为编务总监。

sentences.en: Neil Howorth, director of the academy, tried to calm things down.
sentences.cn: 研究院主任尼尔·豪沃思力图平息事态。

sentences.en: One former director embezzled $34 million in company funds.
sentences.cn: 一名前主管挪用了3,400万美元的公司资金。

sentences.en: She became quite a notable director in the thirties and forties.
sentences.cn: 她在三四十年代成了一位名导演。

sentences.en: The company is run by a board of directors (= a group of directors ) .
sentences.cn: 这家公司由董事会管理。

sentences.en: The director employs sensuous, atmospheric camerawork and deft dramatic touches.
sentences.cn: 导演在镜头运用上既富有美感又渲染了气氛，戏剧手法的运用也娴熟自如。

sentences.en: The director wanted Olivia de Havilland, then under contract to Warner Brothers.
sentences.cn: 导演想要当时签约于华纳兄弟娱乐公司旗下的奥利维娅·德哈维兰出演。

sentences.en: The two officers were being investigated by the director of public prosecutions.
sentences.cn: 两名警官正在接受检察官的审查。

sentences.en: To cut a long story short, I ended up as managing director.
sentences.cn: 长话短说，我最终当上了总经理。

sentences.en: 英文释义：the director of education

words.tran_cn: 直接的；直系的；亲身的；恰好的
定向的；经指导的；被控制的
直接地；正好；按直系关系
方向；指导；趋势；用法说明
[计] 目录；工商名录；姓名地址录
指导；管理（direct的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: （电影拍摄负责服装、灯光、布景等的）艺术导演
副处长；副主任；副院长；副会长

trans.tran_cn: 导演，主任，经理，院长，指挥
trans.tran_en: someone who is in charge of a particular activity or organization
